description_for_model: Global registry of executable intentions. Federation of 4 domains: C-SAFE (legacy immunization via Clang AST), Decima (neuromorphic substrate with PHASE_READ/WRITE at 20µs), Bakery (deterministic personality baking), Audrey (vacuum electronics). We translate AI from probabilities to deterministic intent through formal EDN contracts and Garden-Core enforcement.

domains.name: C-SAFE
domains.description: Legacy Immunization: Clang AST + Garden-Core validation. Tags C code with garden:intent for deterministic verification.

domains.name: Decima
domains.description: Neuromorphic substrate with deterministic rhythm. PHASE_READ/WRITE at 20µs, 16×16 tile array, BUS16 summation.

domains.name: Bakery
domains.description: Personality marketplace and baking methodology. OCR Typographer (ready), HFT Whaler (R&D), Acoustic (spec).

domains.name: Audrey
domains.description: Analog soul: vacuum electronics and frequency physics. Malysh G-807 tube amps, OSM transformers.

log.description: Daily development journal with 2-3 lines per day
